title: Building Cloud Native microservices with Spring Cloud & Netflix OSS
keywords: spring cloud training, netflix oss trainign, spring boot training, microservices training
metaDescription: Intensive, practical class on building and maintaining production-ready Microservices with Spring Cloud and Netflix OSS stack.
description: The goal of this intensive, practical course is to familiarize you with Spring Cloud and Netflix OSS stack in the context of building production-ready microservices.
certification: You earn a certificate of participation by attending the course. No exam required.
language: The course is taught in English.

trainer.name: Marcin Grzejszczak
trainer.title: Senior Software Developer @ Pivotal, Member of Spring-Cloud team, Author of Mockito books
